name: bot_manager
description: A service for monitoring when we need to reload our running containers.
author: Johnny Hausman

scripts.devBuild:darwin:linux: rm node_modules/.yarn-integrity && docker run -it --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/app -w /app node yarn
scripts.devBuild:win32: del node_modules\.yarn-integrity&& docker run -it --mount type=bind,source=%cd%,target=/app -w /app node yarn
